title.narrative: Marginalized women and young women have access to, participate in and achieve quality learning, entrepreneurship and employment outcomes through second chance education.

description.narrative: The programmes aims to ensure that marginalized women and young women who are at risk of being left behind have access to, participate in and achieve quality learning, entrepreneurship and employment outcomes through second chance education and vocational training.

participating-org.narrative: United Nations Joint Programme on HIV and AIDS Secretariat (UNAIDS)

provider-org.narrative: United Nations Joint Programme on HIV and AIDS Secretariat (UNAIDS)

title.narrative: SN_DRF
Cross sectoral legislative and policy reform supported to promote marginalized women’s and young women’s access to second chance education.
